text: Joel Courtney (born January 31, 1996)Joel Courtney Bio. is an American actor known for his role as Joe Lamb in the 2011 movie Super 8. He also played the lead role of Peter Moore on The CW's series The Messengers. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Monterey County, California
title: Joel Courtney
